name: Tecasyge
description:
Tecasyge | TCG Concept Game (CardCraft) The game is an attempt to combine part of the rules of a strategy game (RTS)
and part of the rules of a card game (TCG).

Alpha demo version.See on github:https://github.com/covicDev/Tecasyge 

Hints:
Key 'R' restarts level.
Hold 'Mouse Right Button' to move camera.
